TermRelatedObject.name: TermRelatedObject
TermRelatedObject.description: Represents the relationship between a term and the object for which the term is defined.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The effective date of the term associated with the related object.

EffectiveToDate.description: The expiration date of the term associated with the related object.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the term associated with the related object is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the term related object.

OwnerId.description: Owner ID of the term related object.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The reference object for which a term is applicable. For example, a term applicable for a financial product.

TermId.description: The term applicable for the related object.
